## IDataStoreORM.dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentials() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Returns a list of [UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)s that match the given filter based on the top level properties of a credential.

These are VerifiableCredentials that were stored using [dataStoreSaveVerifiableCredential](./core.idatastore.datastoresaveverifiablecredential.md).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentials(args: FindCredentialsArgs, context: AuthorizedDIDContext): Promise<Array<UniqueVerifiableCredential>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| args      | [FindCredentialsArgs](./core.findcredentialsargs.md)   | The filter to apply when querying                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| context   | [AuthorizedDIDContext](./core.authorizeddidcontext.md) | Can be used to signal that only a particular DID is authorized to perform this operation. This will cause the result to only contain data that this DID should be able to access.This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Array&lt;[UniqueVerifiableCredential](./core.uniqueverifiablecredential.md)&gt;&gt;
